function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mention of COVID-19 and its impact on supply chain management","Impact":"Potential for spreading fear and anxiety about the pandemic","Mitigation":"Provide accurate and balanced information about COVID-19 and its impact on supply chain management","Technologies":"Information dissemination, communication technologies","People":"General public, supply chain professionals","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Study of disease spread modeling and its relevance to the pandemic","Impact":"Increased focus on disease spread and potential for misconceptions about contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Education and awareness about disease spread modeling and its application to specific diseases like COVID-19","Technologies":"Simulation modeling, data visualization tools","People":"Researchers, policymakers, general public","Owner":"Research institutions, health organizations"},{"Description":"Analysis of the economic impact of the pandemic on supply chains and SMEs","Impact":"Potential for influencing economic decisions and policies based on incomplete information","Mitigation":"Transparent and accurate reporting of the economic impact, consideration of multiple sources of data","Technologies":"Data analytics, economic modeling tools","People":"Economic analysts, policymakers, business owners","Owner":"Economic research institutions, government agencies"}]}
